titleStmt.title: The taking of Carnarven the castle, works, ammunition bag and baggage, by Major-Generall Mitton: where are, the Lord Byron, Collonel Vere. Collonel Vane. And divers officers of note, [double brace] bishops, gentlemen, malignant clergymen, and others. With our prosperous proceedings in the totall reducing of North-VVales. Printed by the originall papers, and published according to order of Parliament.
titleStmt.author: S. R.
England and Wales. Parliament.

notesStmt.note: Consists of two documents, the second of which is a letter signed: S.R.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
